name: Newsbeat-PodcastofInsightfulNewsArticles
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
We pick through hundreds of news sources every day and pick out the best original news articles written, and we narrate them for you. So you just sit back and listen while you go about your day. 

Our editorial curation ensures that you are not inundated with fake news and sensational headlines.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
